attributes.action: Make Mr Bruce Forsyth Sir Bruce Forsyth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We gaveknighthoods to people for winning gold medals and for been fantastic football managers. However we have failed to give a knighthood to the man that has kept not only us but our parents and their parents too. Make Bruce Forsyth a Sir.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Knightbrucie/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
